name: The Last Operator
description: Infiltrate, locate and retrieve. Be the PRO that takes down Monolith Corp by taking on objective based missions to collect evidence against them. Single Player classic tactical action for VR.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX970 Storage: 9 GB available space Additional Notes: HTC Vive, Oculus Rift, front-facing controls available
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX980 Storage: 9 GB available space Additional Notes: HTC Vive, Oculus Rift, roomscale recommended
